headline: Brave Web Browser
description: Being that Brave Web Browser is focused around privacy and security - it's odd that we don't hear much about it and it's not even that popular. Any opinions about this? I am thinking of using Brave instead of Chrome. Brave is faster. But I live in my browser and it's a big move. I use Windows, iOS and Linux - home, work and school - so I would be all in if I switched.
description_zh-Hans: 由于Brave网络浏览器是围绕隐私和安全的--奇怪的是，我们没有听到多少关于它的消息，甚至没有那么流行。Any opinions about this? I am thinking of using Brave instead of Chrome. Brave is faster. But I live in my browser and it's a big move. I use Windows, iOS and Linux - home, work and school - so I would be all in if I switched.
description_zh-Hant: 由於Brave網絡瀏覽器是圍繞隱私和安全的--奇怪的是，我們沒有聽到多少關於它的消息，甚至沒有那麼流行。Any opinions about this? I am thinking of using Brave instead of Chrome. Brave is faster. But I live in my browser and it's a big move. I use Windows, iOS and Linux - home, work and school - so I would be all in if I switched.
